roleset.name: bid too much
roleset.note: OVERBID-V NOTES: Frames file for 'overbid' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from overbid.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: the one example
example.text: J. William Grimes, former president of ESPN, says NBC may ``come in with a huge bid for college basketball to take it away from CBS and say, `We can overbid, too.'''

roleset.name: bid more than someone else
roleset.note: OVERBID-V NOTES: Maybe these two senses could be conflated, but it's hard to see how. (from overbid.02-v)
